Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Colonia Roma and its geographical context?
Options:
A. a) Colonia Roma is a neighborhood in Mexico City.
B. b) Mexico City is part of the country Mexico.
C. c) Colonia Roma is a city in Mexico.
D. d) Mexico is the country where Mexico City is located.
Answer: a) Colonia Roma is a neighborhood in Mexico City.

Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Tepeji Street, Colonia Roma, and Mexico City?
Options:
A. a) Tepeji Street is located in Colonia Roma.
B. b) Colonia Roma is a neighborhood in Mexico City.
C. c) Mexico City contains the neighborhood of Colonia Roma.
D. d) All of the above
